### **Professional Summary**

---

Software Engineer with 5+ years of experience in developing Generative AI applications, RESTful API services, and IoT solutions. Working experience  in different Python web frameworks and various database technologies such as relational, document and vector databases. Have working experience of AWS services. Proven leader in project implementation, from requirements gathering to deployment. Recognized for mentoring junior engineers, fostering their growth, and driving impactful contributions to team success.

### **Skills**

---

| Programming Languages | Highly Skilled: Python Intermediate Skilled: Java, javascript, TypeScript   |
| :---- | :---- |
| Frameworks and Libraries | FastAPI, Django, React |
| Databases and others | PostgreSQL, Mongodb, ElasticSearch, Redis, Qdrant |
| Cloud & Infra | Docker, Linux, CI/CD with Github actions,  AWS \- ECS, EC2, S3, Lambda, LightSail, Amplify |

### **Work Experience**

---

**Senior Software Engineer at Cefalo**  
Dhaka, Bangladesh, 01/2025 \- Present

* Application Monitoring Infrastructure design and development.   
* Performance improvement in key areas e.g. decreased memory usage 50%, response time 90%   
* Successfully migrated Billions of data rows from single database architecture to tenant architecture.  
* **Tech Stack: FastAPI, FastAPI, PostgreSQL, Jenkins, Grafana, Prometheus, Loki, Jaeger**

**Software Engineer at Gigalogy**  
Dhaka, Bangladesh, 09/2023 \- 12/2024

* Led the backend development of a Retrieval Augmented Generation (RAG) SaaS platform and assisting  frontend teams in design and developing client services.   
* Designed a concept of profiles that let users create reusable and easily customizable GPT persona. That made 90% decreases in prompt Ideation and experimentation to deployment time.    
* Developed a Large language Model based empathetic and responsive product recommendations system that is now deployed in 5+ Japanese e-commerce sites.  
* Mentored junior software engineers, enhancing team proficiency in development tools and best practices.  
* **Tech Stack: LLM, OpenAI, Anthropic, FastAPI, PostgreSQL, ElasticSearch & Qdrant**

**R\&D Team Lead at Unipolar Automation Technologies**  
Dhaka, Bangladesh, 04/2022 \- 08/2023 

* Spearheading a 6 members Industrial IoT team to build bespoke solutions for manufacturing industries and deployed 4 new products to the market.  
* Designed a synchronous weight logging system, optimizing product tracking and data synchronization, boosting operational efficiency by 30% and reducing erroneous data entry significantly.  
* Crafted a desktop app for real-time power failure monitoring systems for power distribution hubs under DPDC.  
* Written OPC-UA protocol libraries, enhancing system compatibility and reducing integration times by 40% for industrial automation projects.  
* **Tech Stack: Django, PostgreSQL, AWS EC2, QT PySide6, Docker, Websocket, MongoDB**

**Software Engineer at Unipolar Automation Technologies**  
 Dhaka, Bangladesh, 07/2019 \- 03/2022

* Designed a web based GIS(Geographical Information System) to visualize real-time water supply of the municipality.  
* Developed a desktop application to run a concrete mixing plant that increased the plant's operational efficiency.

**Intern at Apache Foundation, Google Summer of Code**   
Remote, 04/2015-08/2015

* Developed a PDF debugging desktop software based on Java swing framework. This application aids users in finding  out issues with PDF files and debugging those issues through visual and hex editors.    
* Project link: [https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/PDFBOX-2530](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/PDFBOX-2530)  
* **Tech Stack: Java, Swing, PDFBox**

### **Teaching and Mentoring**

**Computer Technology Instructor at Government Munshiganj Polytechnic Institute**,  
Munshiganj, Bangladesh, 09/2017 \- 07/2019

* Taught Data Structure, Networking and Database Courses to Computer technology Diploma classes..
